mapper.select: SELECT CLNT_NUM, CLNT_NAME, CLNT_GRADE, PHONE_NUM_1 FROM INDVDL_CLNT WHERE 1=1

SELECT I.CLNT_NAME, I.PHONE_NUM_1, TO_CHAR(N.WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRITE_DATE, E.EMP_NAME , N.CNSL_TYPE_NUM, CASE WHEN N.CNSL_RSLT_NUM = 0 THEN '완료' WHEN N.CNSL_RSLT_NUM = 1 THEN '미처리' WHEN N.CNSL_RSLT_NUM = 2 THEN '예약' WHEN N.CNSL_RSLT_NUM = 3 THEN '이관' END CNSL_RSLT_NUM FROM(SELECT CLNT_NUM, CLNT_NAME, CLNT_GRADE, PHONE_NUM_1 FROM INDVDL_CLNT )I INNER JOIN CNSL_NOTE N ON I.CLNT_NUM = N.CLNT_NUM INNER JOIN EMP E ON N.EMP_NUM = E.EMP_NUM WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY I.CLNT_NUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INDVDL_CLNT(CLNT_NUM, CLNT_NAME, CLNT_GRADE, PHONE_NUM_1, PHONE_NUM_2, ADRS, DTL_ADRS) VALUES (INDVDL_CLNT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{clnt_name}, #{clnt_grade}, #{phon_num_1}, #{phon_num_2}, #{adrs}, #{dtl_adrs})
INSERT INTO CNSL_NOTE(CNSL_NUM, CLNT_NUM, EMP_NUM, CNSL_TYPE_NUM, CONT, CNSL_RSLT_NUM) VALUES (CNSL_NOTE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{clnt_num}, #{emp_num}, #{cnsl_type_num}, #{cont}, #{cnsl_rslt_num})
